title: why do i have to lose my promos because people afk and im the only one whose losing
body: i have 1 win 1 loss in promos i logged in to my last game of the promos and someone afks isn't their a system to stop loses especially in promotions

replies.body: remake and the free win when you reenter promos

Only works if they didnt connect. 

From whats being said, theyve connected then afkd.

The OP asked what systems were in place to prevent losses from afk behaviour, he answered. Remake and free wins are the systems in place. The reason those systems don't extend further is because of abuse cases.
